dominant-baseline.name: dominant-baseline
dominant-baseline.value: auto | text-bottom | alphabetic | ideographic | middle | central | mathematical | hanging | text-top
dominant-baseline.appliesTo: block containers, inline boxes, table rows, grid containers, flex containers, and SVG text content elements

alignment-baseline.name: alignment-baseline
alignment-baseline.value: baseline | text-bottom | alphabetic | ideographic | middle | central | mathematical | text-top
alignment-baseline.appliesTo: inline-level boxes, flex items, grid items, table cells, and SVG text content elements

baseline-shift.name: baseline-shift
baseline-shift.appliesTo: inline-level boxes and SVG text content elements
baseline-shift.percentages: refer to the used value of line-height
baseline-shift.computedValue: the specified keyword and/or a computed <length-percentage> value

line-height.name: line-height
line-height.appliesTo: non-replaced inline boxes and SVG text content elements
line-height.computedValue: the specified keyword, a number, or a computed <length> value

text-edge.name: text-edge
text-edge.value: leading | [ text | cap | ex | ideographic | ideographic-ink ] [ text | alphabetic | ideographic | ideographic-ink ]?

inline-sizing.name: inline-sizing
inline-sizing.appliesTo: inline boxes, but not ruby container boxes nor internal ruby boxes

initial-letter.name: initial-letter
initial-letter.appliesTo: certain inline-level boxes and ::first-letter and inside ::marker boxes (see prose)
initial-letter.computedValue: the keyword normal or a number paired with an integer

initial-letter-align.name: initial-letter-align
initial-letter-align.appliesTo: certain inline-level boxes and ::first-letter and inside ::marker boxes (see prose)

initial-letter-wrap.name: initial-letter-wrap
initial-letter-wrap.appliesTo: certain inline-level boxes and ::first-letter and inside ::marker boxes (see prose)
initial-letter-wrap.percentages: relative to logical width of (last fragment of) initial letter
